source: National 211 network and veteran organizations database

resources.name: Oklahoma Department of Veterans Affairs
resources.description: State agency providing veteran benefits counseling, disability compensation assistance, and connections to state and federal benefits programs.

resources.name: 2-1-1 Oklahoma Information and Referral Service
resources.description: Free, confidential helpline connecting veterans to community resources including housing, employment, food, legal aid, mental health services, and benefits assistance.

resources.name: Veterans Crisis Line - National Support
resources.description: 24/7 confidential crisis support for veterans. Free support 365 days a year with real people qualified to support veterans. No VA enrollment required.

resources.name: Veterans of Foreign Wars - Oklahoma Posts
resources.description: VFW membership organization providing VA claims assistance, financial grants, mental wellness support, and community programs. Accredited service officers provide free VA claims assistance.

resources.name: American Legion - Oklahoma Department
resources.description: National veteran service organization offering member benefits, community support, youth programs, and connections to state and federal veteran benefits.

resources.name: VA Benefits Administration - Oklahoma Region
resources.description: Federal VA office providing disability compensation, GI Bill education, home loan assistance, vocational rehabilitation, employment services, and life insurance.

resources.name: Volunteers of America - Veteran Services
resources.phone: Contact national office or local chapter
resources.description: National nonprofit providing mental health services, affordable housing solutions, community outreach, and veteran services.

resources.name: Operation Homefront - Military and Veteran Family Support
resources.description: National nonprofit providing emergency financial assistance, housing programs, and support for military and veteran families. Covers rent, utilities, food, and healthcare.

resources.name: Military Officers Association of America (MOAA)
resources.description: Advocacy and resource organization for military officers and families. Offers benefits guidance, career transition assistance, financial planning tools, and exclusive member benefits.

resources.name: VetsinTech - Veteran Technology Education and Employment
resources.description: 501(c)(3) nonprofit connecting veterans with technology education, employment, and entrepreneurship opportunities. Offers VIT Academy courses and mentorship.
